RESOURCE.NAME: Boilerpipe Content Detection
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Uses boilerpipe to determine which sections of a document are interesting content and which are just boilerplate

PARAMETER.NAME: debug
PARAMETER.COMMENT: In debug mode internal variables will be exposed as annotation features

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the input annotation set.

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the output annotation set.

PARAMETER.NAME: failOnMissingInputAnnotations
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Throw an exception when there are none of the required input annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: extractor
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The type of extractor to use to find the content

PARAMETER.NAME: allContent
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Determines how the list of mime types is interpretted

PARAMETER.NAME: mimeTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: A list of mime types that determines which documents are fully processed

PARAMETER.NAME: contentAnnotationName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the annotations to create over real document content

PARAMETER.NAME: boilerplateAnnotationName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the annotations to create over boilerplate sections

PARAMETER.NAME: annotateContent
PARAMETER.COMMENT: If true then annotations spanning content will be created

PARAMETER.NAME: annotateBoilerplate
PARAMETER.COMMENT: If true then annotations spanning boilerplate will be created

PARAMETER.NAME: useHintsFromOriginalMarkups
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Use annotations from the Original markups as hints for finding content

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process
